events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your credentials carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to your software development experience noted in your resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to your profile and will contact you shortly for the next steps.
We completed the initial screening where your skills and experiences were reviewed against our current software engineering needs.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for a technical interview at your earliest convenience.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. The session will focus on your software development and problem-solving skills.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the engineering panel about your coding expertise.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss your fit within the company culture and address any questions.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and all parties feel optimistic about your potential role in the engineering team.
An official job offer has been proposed, including details about compensation, benefits, and expected start date for the software engineer position.
We received your positive feedback regarding the job offer and your excitement to join our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the software engineer job offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started with access to our developer resources and introductory training sessions planned.
The hiring process has officially closed. Congratulations on joining our engineering team as a new software developer.
